page.title: 02CLUBS IN HOLCOTE & SALFORD
page.content: The largest organisation in both villages is the Youth Club. The age of members range roughly from ten to twenty years. The Club meets every Monday at the Village Hall from 7pm to 9.30pm. The Youth Leader is Mr. Nicholas Hall of Whitsundales Farm. Members indulge in practically every type of indoor game such as snooker and table tennis, often taking part in contests with other parties. Sometimes they arrange entertainment at community events in the village. The Wednesday Club first formed over a year ago is popular among residents unable to travel elsewhere for various reasons including lack of public transport.The Club is self supporting due to the efforts of five ladies who keep the wheels in motion. Our W.I.is very active.
